description_en:
**Avalon-Avocom 0.1% W/W Cream 30 gm** is an effective topical cream that relieves redness, swelling, itching, inflammation, and discomfort from various skin conditions, including psoriasis and eczema. **Avalon-Avocom 0.1% W/W Cream 30 gm** works by activating natural substances in the skin to reduce swelling, redness, and itching. It is a powerful topical corticosteroid, and is used to avoid eczema flare-ups and reduce red, itchy, and dry skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Avalon-Avocom 0.1% W/W Cream 30 gm**:
â­ Apply a thin film to the affected area once daily as directed by your doctor.
â­ Gently rub in.
â­ Do not cover the area with bandages unless instructed by your doctor.
â­ Wash and dry your hands before use.
â­ Spread the cream evenly over the affected area.
â­ Use it on all affected areas, not just the worst.
â­ Avoid using it on broken skin or cuts.
â­ Wash your hands after use (unless you are treating your hands).
â­ Wait at least 10 minutes before using other creams.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Avalon-Avocom 0.1% W/W Cream 30 gm**:
â­ Mometasone Furoate.

#AvalonAvocom #EczemaTreatment #TopicalCream #Psoriasis #SkinConditions #SkinCare #SkinHealth #SkinBeauty #SkinCareProducts #SaudiArabia

shortdescription_en: **Avalon-Avocom** cream treats eczema and psoriasis, relieving redness and itching. Use as directed by your doctor.

description_en:
**Avalon-Avocom 0.1% W/W Ointment 30 gm** is an effective ointment that relieves redness, swelling, itching, inflammation, and discomfort associated with a variety of skin conditions, including psoriasis and eczema. **Avalon-Avocom** works by activating natural substances in the skin to reduce swelling, redness, and itching. It contains mometasone, a potent topical corticosteroid, used to avoid flare-ups and reduce eczema-induced red, itchy, and dry skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Avalon-Avocom 0.1% W/W Ointment 30 gm**:
â­ Apply a thin film to the affected area once daily as directed by your doctor.
â­ Gently rub in.
â­ Do not cover the area with bandages unless instructed by your doctor.
â­ Wash and dry your hands before use.
â­ Spread the ointment evenly over the irritated skin.
â­ Use on all affected areas.
â­ Avoid applying to broken skin or cuts.
â­ Wash your hands after use (unless treating your hands).
â­ Wait at least 10 minutes before using any other products.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Avalon-Avocom 0.1% W/W Ointment 30 gm**:
â­ Mometasone Furoate.

#AvalonAvocom #EczemaTreatment #SkinOintment #SkinCare #Psoriasis #Mometasone #SkinHealth #SkinBeauty #SkinCareProducts #SaudiArabia

shortdescription_en: **Avalon-Avocom** ointment treats eczema and psoriasis. Relieves redness, itching, and inflammation. Use as directed by your doctor.

description_en: **Avogain 5%** Promo Pack (1+1) Spray, an effective treatment for hereditary hair loss in men.  Containing Minoxidil, it works to prevent hair loss and stimulate regrowth. For best results, use twice daily for at least two months. ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Avogain 5%**: â­ Apply to dry scalp twice daily. â­ Distribute evenly over the affected area. â­ Avoid inhaling the spray. â­ For external use only. ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Avogain 5%**: â­ Minoxidil. â­ Other ingredients. Discontinue use if any side effects occur. Consult your doctor before starting **Avogain 5%**. #Avogain #HairLoss #Minoxidil #HairGrowth #HairCare #HealthyHair #HairLossTreatment #HairCareProducts #MensGrooming #HairHealth

description_en:
**Bepanthen** Gentle Face Cleanser Wash is perfect for dry and sensitive skin. â­ Gentle, soap-free formula effectively cleanses without drying. â­ Maintains skin's natural moisture levels. â­ Leaves skin feeling refreshed and clean. â­ Enriched with Dexpanthenol, Niacinamide, Glycerin, Physiological Lipids, and Argan Oil. â­ Dermatologically tested. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bepanthen** Gentle Face Cleanser Wash:
â­ Apply a suitable amount to damp skin. â­ Gently massage using circular motions. â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bepanthen** Gentle Face Cleanser Wash:
â­ Dexpanthenol â­ Niacinamide â­ Glycerin â­ Physiological Lipids â­ Argan Oil

#Bepanthen #Skincare #FaceWash #DrySkin #SensitiveSkin #SkincareProducts #KSA #Beauty #SkinHealth #SkincareRoutine

shortdescription_en: Bepanthen Derma daily face wash, ideal for dry skin. Gentle formula effectively cleanses while maintaining skin moisture.

title_en: **Bepanthen Anti-Scar Gel** for less visible scars 20 g
title_ar: **Ø¨ÙŠØ¨Ø§Ù†Ø«ÙŠÙ† Ø¬Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø¶Ø§Ø¯ Ù„Ù„Ù†Ø¯Ø¨Ø§Øª** Ù„Ù†Ø¯Ø¨Ø§Øª Ø£Ù‚Ù„ Ø¨Ø±ÙˆØ²Ù‹Ø§ 20 Ø¬Ù…
description_en:
**Bepanthen Anti-Scar Gel** helps prevent the formation of red and raised scars and reduces redness, itching, and tension associated with older scars.  It contains silicone to maintain skin moisture, humectants like panthenol, and a massage ball to help break down collagen fibers in older scars. **Bepanthen Anti-Scar Gel** is suitable for adults and children and should be used for at least two months. Do not use on open wounds or near the eyes.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bepanthen Anti-Scar Gel**: 
â­ Apply a sufficient amount as a thin layer on the scar.
â­ Let it dry before covering with clothes.
â­ Use twice daily, and after bathing or exercising.
â­ Use the massage ball (for scars older than a month) before applying the gel.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bepanthen Anti-Scar Gel**: 
â­ Purified Water, Panthenol, Panthenyl Glycol, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, DC7-Silicone Blend 0992, and Citric Acid Anhydrous.

#Bepanthen #AntiScarGel #ScarTreatment #HealthySkin #SkinBeauty #SkinCare #SkinCareProducts #Scars #SkinHealth #KSA
